CommandStatus.title: CommandStatus
CommandStatus.description: PENDING[The processor has not completed processing of the command], ERROR[The command processor indicates it was not able to complete processing of the command], COMPLETE[The command processor has completed processing of the command],

Resource.title: Resource

RequestPatternType.title: RequestPatternType
RequestPatternType.description: ASYNCHRONOUS_REQUEST[Do not wait for a reply from the provider.], SYNCHRONOUS_REQUEST_RESPONSE[Wait for a reply for a configured period of time.],

Method.title: Method
Method.description: CREATE[This indicates the resource should be or has to be created.], DELETE, UPDATE, READ,

Domain.title: Domain
Domain.description: The list of IAA high level domains.A source reference is required. AAM, CLM, CMM, CIM, FTM, PMM, PLM, VHM, RTM, UWM, RIM, PLA, PDC, BDM, LCM, PVM,

LineOfBusiness.title: LineOfBusiness

Brand.title: Brand
Brand.description:
AMI, STATE, NZI, ANY[Information which is across or not specific to  a particular brand], ASB[Information which is related to the ASB Intermediated channel], BNZ[Information which is related to the BNZ intermediated channel], COOPERATIVE[Information related to the Co-operative Bank intemediated channel
],

Version.title: Version
Version.description: IAGIAA_2[The message is version 2 of the IAGIAA  [http://www.iag.co.nz/soa/iagiaa/v2]], ANY[Any version], TOWER_DOCUMENT[A VRD formatted message], IAGIAA_1[The message is version 2 of the IAGIAA  [http://www.iag.co.nz/soa/iagiaa/v2]], WEBAPI_1,

MessageHeader.title: MessageHeader
MessageHeader.description:
TRANSACTION_CORRELATION_ID[Header whose value is intended to be the assigned from the MULE_CORRELATION_ID for web apis.], OAUTH[An OAuth Token], JWT[A JWT Token
],

id.description: The id associated with a single command.

publisherServiceName.description: Name of the service publishing the command

processorServiceName.description: Name of the command processor service

responseMessage.description: Response returned after processing the command, this can also be a error response

correlationId.description: An identifier which allows traceability across a number of apis call. This supports tracing a single high level transaction across multiple api calls.
